links.*: Letter to Clyde S. Kilby (11 November 1964)
Letter to L. Sprague de Camp
Letter to the Royal Society of Literature

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''First or second week''': [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] invites [[Walter Hooper]] to his house. They talk mostly about [[C.S. Lewis]], who recently had died.<ref>[[Joseph Pearce]], "Tolkien and C.S. Lewis: An Interview with Walter Hooper", in ''[[Tolkien: A Celebration]]'', pp. 190-1</ref>
* '''[[9 January|9]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 254]].
* '''[[10 January|10]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to the Royal Society of Literature|a letter to the Royal Society of Literature]].
* '''[[17 January|17]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Mrs A. Mountfield|a letter to Mrs. A. Mountfield]].
* '''[[18 January|18]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Justin Arundale|a letter to Justin Arundale]].
* '''[[20 January|20]]''' - The [[1965 BBC Interview]] with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is made.
* '''[[20 January|20]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] starts writing [[Letter to Przemyslaw Mroczkowski (20–26 January 1964)|a letter to Professor Przemyslaw Mroczkowski]].
* '''[[26 January|26]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] finishes writing [[Letter to Przemyslaw Mroczkowski (20–26 January 1964)|a letter to Professor Przemyslaw Mroczkowski]].
==February==
* '''[[8 February|8]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 254a]].
==March==
* '''[[5 March|5]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Eileen Elgar (5 March 1964)|a letter to Eileen Elgar]] (of which a part was published as [[letter 255]]) and encloses the manuscripts [[Concerning ... 'The Hoard']] and [[Kinship of the Half-elven]].
* '''[[16 March|16]]''' - Artist [[Quinton Hoover]] is born.
==April==
* '''?''' - [[I, Palantir (April 1964)|''I, Palantir'', issue 3]] is published.
* '''[[20 April|20]]''' - Actor [[Andy Serkis]] is born.
==May==
* '''[[13 May|13]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 256]].
* '''[[28 May|28]]''' - ''[[Tree and Leaf]]'' is first published in the UK.
* '''[[30 May|30]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes a [[Letter to Jane T. Sibley]]

==June==
* '''[[6 June|6]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Sue Parman|a letter to Sue Parman]].
* '''[[7 June|7]]''' - Actor [[Brian Talbot]] is born.
* '''[[13 June|13]]-[[15 June|15]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes a [[Letter to W.R. Matthews|a letter to W.R. Matthews]].

==July==
* '''[[10 July|10]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Alan White|a letter to Alan White]].
* '''[[15 July|15]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] sends [[Letter to Miss J.L. Curry|a letter to Miss J.L. Curry]].
* '''[[16 July|16]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 257]].
* '''?''' - [[L. Sprague de Camp]] sends [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] a copy of his anthology ''[[Swords & Sorcery]]''.
==August==
* '''[[2 August|2]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 258]].
* '''[[7 August|7]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 259]].
* '''[[10 August|10]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Carole Ward|a letter to Carole Ward]].
* '''[[16 August|16]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 260]].
* '''[[30 August|30]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 261]].
* '''[[30 August|30]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to L. Sprague de Camp|a letter to L. Sprague de Camp]].
==September==
* '''[[1 September|1]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] met [[Clyde S. Kilby]] 
* '''[[7 September|7]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 262]].
* '''[[10 September|10]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 263]].
* '''[[11 September|11]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[letter 264]].
* '''[[30 September|30]]''' - Actor [[Bernard Rebel]] dies.

==October==
* '''[[9 October|9]]''' - [[Guillermo del Toro]], co-writer of the upcoming ''[[The Hobbit (film series)|The Hobbit]]'' duology, is born.
* '''[[10 October|10]]''' - The first episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[10 October|10]]''' - Actor [[Quinton Flynn]] is born.
* '''[[17 October|17]]''' - The second episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[24 October|24]]''' - The third episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[31 October|31]]''' - The fourth episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
==November==
* '''[[1 November|1]]''' - Actor [[Daran Norris]] is born.
* '''[[7 November|7]]''' - The fifth episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[11 November|11]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 265]].
* '''[[11 November|11]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Clyde S. Kilby (11 November 1964)|a letter to Clyde S. Kilby]].
* '''[[14 November|14]]''' - The sixth episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[21 November|21]]''' - The seventh episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[24 November|24]]''' - Robert Graves, [[University of Oxford|Oxford]]'s Professor of Poetry, introduces [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to [[wikipedia:Ava Gardner|Ava Gardner]]. They had never heard of one another, and both did not know why the other was famous.
* '''[[26 November|26]]''' - The [[1964 BBC Interview]] with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] was made.
* '''[[28 November|28]]''' - The eighth episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[30 November|30]]''' - ''[[El hobito]]'', the first translation into Spanish of ''[[The Hobbit]]'', is published.

==December==
* '''[[5 December|5]]''' - The ninth episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[12 December|12]]''' - The tenth episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[19 December|19]]''' - The eleventh episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[26 December|26]]''' - The twelfth episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[31 December|31]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes a letter to [[Letter to Ingeborg Korff|Ingeborg Korff and her pupils]].
==?==
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes the essay "[[The Ulsterior Motive]]".
* '''?''' - Author [[Chris Smith]] is born.
